title: MCP Server Overview
subtitle: View which MCP servers and tools are available for each agent phase

context7.name: Context7
context7.description: Documentation lookup for libraries and frameworks via @upstash/context7-mcp

graphiti.name: Graphiti Memory
graphiti.description: Knowledge graph for cross-session context. Requires GRAPHITI_MCP_URL env var.

autoClaude.name: Auto-Claude Tools
autoClaude.description: Build progress tracking, session context, discoveries & gotchas recording

linear.name: Linear
linear.description: Project management via Linear API. Requires LINEAR_API_KEY env var.

electron.name: Electron MCP
electron.description: Desktop app automation via Chrome DevTools Protocol. Requires ELECTRON_MCP_ENABLED=true.

puppeteer.name: Puppeteer MCP
puppeteer.description: Web browser automation for non-Electron web frontends.

qaReviewer.label: QA Reviewer
qaReviewer.description: Validates acceptance criteria. Uses Electron or Puppeteer based on project type.

qaFixer.label: QA Fixer
qaFixer.description: Fixes QA-reported issues. Uses Electron or Puppeteer based on project type.

insights.label: Insights
insights.description: Interactive AI assistant for code analysis and feature planning

batchAnalysis.label: Batch Analysis
batchAnalysis.description: Batch processing of issues or items
